attributes.additional_details:
This Petition is to Ban Khat (Catha edulis) a harmful drug, it is popular mainly in the East African community.Its main effects are due to two compounds with stimulant properties similar to, but less powerful than, amphetamines. Stimulants speed up your mind and body. It comes from a leafy green plant of the same name. Used mostly in Africa, Khat is becoming more common in Europe - particularly in some immigrant communities.
This Is a harmful drug which had detrimental effects.
